The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.

No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
From the base of chraomai or chre; employment, i.e. An affair; also occasion, demand, requirement or destitution.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.
